name: LW All-Wear Hemp Shorts - 8 in - Men's

features: Made with a lightweight 76% organic cotton/24% hemp blend that’s soft and airy
Classic flat-front chino styling with button closure, zip fly and double-needle belt loops
Two slanted side-entry front pockets; two welted, drop-in rear pockets
Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made them earned a premium for their labor.
